description: TYPO3 v11 Composer Installation with vendor in app/vendor directory

news.reason: Should find georgringer/news extension in app/web/typo3conf/ext directory (installed via Composer)

powermail.reason: Should find in2code/powermail extension in app/web/typo3conf/ext directory (installed via Composer)

custom_tools.reason: Should find custom_tools extension in app/web/typo3conf/ext directory

site_package.reason: Should find site_package extension in app/web/typo3conf/ext directory

notes: TYPO3 v11 Composer installation with custom vendor-dir 'app/vendor'
This matches installations like ihkof-bundle with vendor at app/vendor
Extensions are located in app/web/typo3conf/ext directory
Vendor directory (app/vendor) contains only libraries and TYPO3 framework
TYPO3 extensions (type: typo3-cms-extension) cannot be in vendor directory
